name: iOS 15.7.7 and iPadOS 15.7.7
available: iPhone 6s (all models), iPhone 7 (all models), iPhone SE (1st generation), iPad Air 2, iPad mini (4th generation), and iPod touch (7th generation)

advisories.available: iPhone 6s (all models), iPhone 7 (all models), iPhone SE (1st generation), iPad Air 2, iPad mini (4th generation), and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited against versions of iOS released before iOS 15.7.
advisories.description: An integer overflow was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Georgy Kucherin (@kucher1n), Leonid Bezvershenko (@bzvr_), Boris Larin (@oct0xor), and Valentin Pashkov of Kaspersky

advisories.available: iPhone 6s (all models), iPhone 7 (all models), iPhone SE (1st generation), iPad Air 2, iPad mini (4th generation), and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited.
advisories.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s (all models), iPhone 7 (all models), iPhone SE (1st generation), iPad Air 2, iPad mini (4th generation), and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited against versions of iOS released before iOS 15.7.
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Georgy Kucherin (@kucher1n), Leonid Bezvershenko (@bzvr_), Boris Larin (@oct0xor), and Valentin Pashkov of Kaspersky
